so_69093035: #!/bin/bash
set -o pipefail # tell bash to call a whole pipeline a failure if any part fails

dateTime=$(date) || exit
dfData=$(df -h /directory/ | tail -n 1 | awk '{ print $2","$3 }') || exit
echo "$dateTime,$dfData"
